menuItems.name: Learn
menuItems.desc: Learning is a journey and a pleasure by itself. So, let's learn something new today. Pick anything from our wide and evergrowing range of topics and let the journey begin.

menuItems.name: Exam
menuItems.desc: You think you have learnt something? Let's test it. Whether you find exam as a challenging or you still have that little exam fearing kid inside you, exams with Knexaa is always fun.

menuItems.name: MemCards
menuItems.desc: Learning something new? Take small notes in pocket cards. Later you can just slide through them to revise the entire topic. Best part: you can carry them anywhere in your pocket.

menuItems.name: Dashboard
menuItems.desc: Here you will find the marksheets, certificates, acheivements and all the glories that you have earned and other vital statistics that will help you scale and understand you progress better.
